title: Rusty’s Learning to Listen
description: In this 8-part series, Rusty shows us the tools and tricks of agriculture and construction while teaching kids how to listen.
quote: Now, if I blow this house up, will you promise to behave and mind your mommy and daddy?
altHero: Rusty in his red hard hat
alt2: Rusty in a house while men set up explosives on the wall
alt4: house blowing up with Rusty’s excited face overlaid
